meanings.definition: The act of removing magnetism from an object.
meanings.sent1: The demagnetizations of the metal strip were necessary for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The technician performed the demagnetizations on the tools to ensure accurate readings.
meanings.sent3: After the demagnetizations, the compass went haywire and pointed in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetizations turned the once powerful magnet into a mere paperweight.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetizations left the object as neutral as a rock.

meanings.definition: The process of making a magnet lose its magnetism.
meanings.sent1: She studied the demagnetizations of magnets in her science class.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the demagnetizations caused the magnet to weaken.
meanings.sent3: The demagnetizations were so effective that the magnet couldn't even pick up a paperclip.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetizations were like erasing a memory from the magnet.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetizations stripped the magnet of its attractive powers.
